content: {"name": "God\u2019s Love We Deliver", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Our meals are frozen therefore potential clients will need to confirm they have the facilities to store and reheat the meals. We do not offer Kosher, Halal or Vegan however we do have a Vegetarian option. Check your eligibility at https://www.glwd.org/get-meals/find-out-if-you-are-eligible-for-medically-tailored-meals/"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery service for those living with serious medical conditions, free of charge.
